official_title: A joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the month of November 1979 as "National REACT Month".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the month November, 1979, as "National REACT Month."

titles.title: A joint resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the month of November 1979 as "National REACT Month".
